package.name: mcr_geometric_relation_monitors
package.description: Geometric relation monitors package used to monitor various geometric realtions Current Functionality: component_wise_pose_error_monitor_node - Monitors the component wise pose error based on the output from component wise pose error calculator node (which will give the difference i.e. error between two poses represented in PoseStamped data type). The monitor then sends event e_done when the error is within the allowed threshold. It also publishes a detail feedback for which parts of the error are within the threshold.
